column4: if you want transparant window, look into murrine gtk engine, it has rgba support; http://janhouse.deviantart.com/art/Gnome-quot-Aero-look-quot-tutorial-142265951
gdm has changed; the old gdm screens on gnome-look.org won't work; have a look at https://launchpad.net/gdm2setup
ok, thanks. no problems then. i just keep my current ones :)
it's easy to change the background, but size and position of password entry etc is going to be difficult
